locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … The tire mart offers trailer washouts in site. I just wish they had a loyalty points program similar to Love’s where you can get points, free showers, and unlimited refills with no expiration. I don’t even bother using my rewards card here …

Could give zero stars off allowed to. Place was filthy, staff arguing with cutovers over concerns of public safety and sanitation. Assigned a shower. Went to assigned shower. Door wide open and filthy everywhere. Towels all over as well. As …

This is one of the worse places to stop bonuses the facilities. Showers are never cleaned, often waiting up to an hour to get someone to clean them. I've been here 3 times where they had no towels. If you want a shower and have time, go …
Night shift lazy af. If you don't know shower count resets at midnight. This means they haven't managed to clean 14 showers in nearly 4 hours.... At a location that does 100+ showers daily.
I waited for my shower for 3 hours, the person who serves the showers just sat and watched TV all this time and people stood and waited.  Terrible service

Sunday evening and this place is FUBAR.  Trash everywhere, double parked trucks, ice machine broken, and over 2 hour wait for shower because they ran out of clean towels.  Corporate needs to see what the hell is going on here!

Ladies professional drivers! Get your fuel if you need to, if you park for the night, and if you take a shower. Please stay to yourself there. Don't trust a friendly employee there. Stay to yourself! My advice.

… again, I would only hope it was next to a flying J's. The best stranded experience I could ever have. Thank you to all the staff and cooks!!!!! I can't afford the shower, if you had  two dollar water hose shower I could do that. Lol

The store part is not bad for the most part. The showers on the other hand is disgusting. The kid just pulled out the dirt towels and put new ones in. The bad room is definitely not being tended to here. Hair pile in the shower, toilet …

TRUCKER REVIEW: The showers are nice--kinda cozy sized. Stopped for 8-hour restart. Great place to shower and relax.  Parked is somewhat cramped with very little angle parking. Washers where down to wash clothes. Bummer. Not sure if that is …

locations.title: Beltway 8 Travel Plaza
locations.content: Beltway 8 Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … and Edlina at the cash register the place is very clean packed with merchandise they have truck parts also hotel style shower with body wash shampoo and lotion nice clean restroom they have lot of choices when it comes to food they have …

This place was conveniently on my route and looked empty so I stopped in. Found out that after you get 75 gallons of diesel you can park for free and get a shower for free. I did so and received a shower voucher and a parking permit. Nikish …
First time here. Big parking lot for 18 wheeler. The shower room was clean, shampoo, lotion, shower gel provided.  Diesel price much better than pilot, loves etc.  I recommend this travel plaza.

Big truck stop a lot of available parking spaces. Paid parking but worth it. It's clean in a safe area. Clean shower's  & laundry available. All the staff are very nice especially Mr. Rana & Mrs. Nikisha.
I put 75 glns diesel and saved $ 35 (cost of shower and parking). It's an amazing deal for the truckers. The staff is also nice personal. Nikisha and Rana are the best cashier's.

This place was amazing during the WINTER STORM 02/2021. We had no water to shower for 5 days & were able to come and shower here for a reasonable price. The showers have their own bathroom as well, sink and bench to set your items down. The …

… helpful. I was experiencing a fuel issue, and they managed to resolve it for me. They also provided an amazing and beautiful shower that was clean and nice. There are plenty of truck parking spaces with good fuel available. You should …

… that I was given, the parking lot was very clean which I am a huge fan of, no vagrants or trash anywhere. The showers were the typical price of $18 but this shower was absolutely amazing they had an overhead and a hand faucet there was no …
Number one place in Houston tx,nice two ladies in gas register (Nikisha and edlina) smile and friendly and i fuel truck got free shower and parking

It’s an amazing truck stop I really enjoyed here including free parking and shower upon filling 75 glens diesel. It’s a wonderful deal for the truckers . Rebeca and Rana served me and my friend very politely and sincerely.

Clean and well stocked store. Parking is now $20. If you buy 60 gallons of fuel you can have free parking or a free shower (your choice)
